definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: I'm from Leshan. Do you know Great Buddha?
sentences.chinese: 我来自乐山，你知道大佛吗？

sentences.english: Tourists coming to Leshan & Emeishan Scenic Areas will have no worries about transportation.
sentences.chinese: 到乐山和峨眉山风景区的游客无须担心交通的问题。

sentences.english: Now Gele Mountain has been a national forest park.
sentences.chinese: 今天，歌乐山已成为国家级森林公园。

sentences.english: A visitor stands in the foot of the Leshan Giant Buddha statue in Leshan, China.
sentences.chinese: 图为一个旅游者站在中国乐山的乐山大佛的脚下。

sentences.english: A visitor stands in the foot of the Leshan Giant Buddha statue in Leshan, China.
sentences.chinese: 图为一个旅游者站在中国乐山的乐山大佛的脚下。

sentences.english: There are many Leshan dialects which may make you feel puzzle in the video.
sentences.chinese: 在视频里有很多乐山方言会让你觉得迷惑。

sentences.english: Leshan city, located in the southwest of Sichuan province, belongs to coteau and highland area.
sentences.chinese: 乐山市位于四川省西南部，地处山区丘陵地带。

sentences.english: Tourists coming to Leshan &Emeishan Scenic Areas will have no worries about transportation.
sentences.chinese: 到乐山和峨眉山风景区的游客无须担心交通的问题。

sentences.english: With methodology, Nan Le-shan is deeply influenced by Whitehead and takes the naturalistic approach.
sentences.chinese: 在方法论上，南乐山采取自然主义的进路，深受。

sentences.english: Others Mountain, the wise man happy water.
Chengdu. I decided to go and see the big Buddha in Leshan and Mount Emei.
sentences.chinese: 我决定去看乐山大佛和峨嵋山。

sentences.english: If you want to know more about Leshan food, please watch the video frequency I show you.
sentences.chinese: 如果还想了解更多乐山美食，请你们看段视频短篇。

sentences.english: Stroilling along the red ancient city walls of Leshan, the picturesque city and countryside views came to your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 沿着乐山红色的古城墙而行，半壁如画江山入眼来。

sentences.english: In the morning we proceed to Leshan, where the Leshan giant Buddha is located.
sentences.chinese: 早上，乘车前往乐山，乐山大佛就在这里。

sentences.english: In the morning we proceed to Leshan, where the Leshan giant Buddha is located.
sentences.chinese: 早上，乘车前往乐山，乐山大佛就在这里。

sentences.english: I decided to go and see the big Buddha in leshan and Mount Emei.
sentences.chinese: 我决定去参观乐山大佛和峨嵋山。
